definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Kehe is the management elite with foresight and dedicated spirit.
sentences.chinese: 遠見卓識富有奉獻精神的管理精英。

sentences.english: Tiitinen can rightly claim to be a visionary.
sentences.chinese: 若果真如此，那蒂蒂寧真可以說是位有遠見的人。

sentences.english: At least , people who were not as farsighted as I will call it that.
sentences.chinese: 至少，那些和我一樣有遠見的人會這樣說。

sentences.english: He is also, in some respects, surprisingly far-seeing.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，他也令人驚異地極富遠見。

sentences.english: During his tenur of office, he put forward a series of new ideas on law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 彭真對司法工作提出了一系列富有遠見的思想。

sentences.english: A puzzle game that requires foresight and skil…
sentences.chinese: 一款需要你有遠見與技巧的益智遊戲。

sentences.english: Therefore, our perspective future, knowledge is infinite, achievement foresight.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我們前瞻未來，學無止境，成就遠見。

sentences.english: Hoho. Visions and prophecies are post-AC.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，這便是遠見和言語才能。

sentences.english: The president was respected by his people for his foresightedness .
sentences.chinese: 總統由於富於遠見而受到人民的尊敬。

sentences.english: Thousands of peer-reviewed scientific studies over decades all pointing to one conclusion?
sentences.chinese: 近二十年來有千萬個遠見卓識的研究都指向這個結論？

sentences.english: Can it prosper without its visionary leader?
sentences.chinese: 離開了它卓有遠見的領袖這個公司還能繁榮嗎？

sentences.english: Farsighted only the future, there is valuable side of life.
sentences.chinese: 有遠見纔有未來，有生命方有價值。

sentences.english: Quality achievement of excellence, insight, creating the future, Hongda special valve Co.
sentences.chinese: 品質成就卓越，遠見開創未來。

sentences.english: That mentality is born of shortsighted fear.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的心態源於缺乏遠見的恐懼。

sentences.english: Aquarius is the sign of visionaries, unconventionality and intellectual independence.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座是有遠見的跡象，異常和智力的獨立性。

sentences.english: He has been Jobs the visionary founder, notably at Apple and Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經是那個創辦了蘋果和皮克斯的有遠見的喬布斯。
